attributes.action: Introduce Basic First Aid and Life Saving skills into schools and colleges
attributes.background: By introducing these skills into national curriculum you are teaching millions of young people how to save a life in an emergency. There are needless lives lost due to people not knowing these lifesaving skills and many children have watch a family member die while waiting for the emergency services

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105790

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
